title: Welcome {{name}}, to react using react-i18next fully type-safe
dialog_message: Creating your Pixsabook — this won't take long.
dialog_message_common: We are processing your request... Please wait
album-creation-failed: Album creation failed. Please try again.
no_albums_sub: Oops !!! You have no albums to view
please-enter-email-for-OTP: Please enter Email to get OTP
email-pin-required: PIN and Email address are required
please-verify-otp-sent: Please verify the OTP sent to your email
create-album-name-help: Please fill in basic details to get started
update-invitees-desc: Add or remove people you want to share this album with
add-front-back-desc: Add album cover and back half pages
drag_multi-photo_msg: Drag multiple photos into the box or click to select photos
drag_multi_subtitle: Drag and arrange multiple photos in order of the album, should not exceed 3MB
drag_photo_msg: Drag photo into the box or click to select a photo
drag_photo_msg_subtitle: Attach photo in png/jpg format, should not exceed 3MB
add-emails-with-whom-you-share: Add emails of people you want to share this album with
search-empty-state: No Creators found with Email ID
creater-email-desc: Logged in user email will be prefilled here
client-email-desc: Client email will be able to administer this album
please-add-at-least-one-invitee: Please add at least one invitee
please-check-invalid-email-invitee: Please check invalid email(s) in invitee list
creator-cannot-be-same-as-client: Creator email cannot be same as Client email
creator-email-should-not-be-in-invitee-l: Creator email should not be in invitee list
client-email-should-not-be-in-invitee-li: Client email should not be in invitee list
cover-back-image-divider: Note, Cover and Back images will be the first and last pages of the album
front-cover-desc: Front cover image will be the first page of the album
back-cover-desc: Back cover image will be the last page of the album
please-add-front-and-back-image: Please add front and back images
please-add-at-least-two-photo: Please add at least two photos
please-add-even-number-of-photos: Please add even number of photos
add-inner-pages-desc: Add album left and right half pages in order you want them to appear. Each page resembles two pages of a book
name: Name
email-desc: Enter unique email address of Editor. All subscription related communication will be tagged to this email
subscription_info: Creator has {{count}} album publish tokens available till {{date}}
subscription-plan-desc: Subscription payments are currently made in cash, we are working to integrate online payments soon
are-you-sure-logout: Are you sure you want to logout?
are-you-sure-publish: Are you sure you want to perform this action?
creator: CREATOR
home-page-message: Showing Pixsabook Albums available to you
work-page-message: Manage Pixsabook Albums created by you
billing-page-message: Upgrade, downgrade or review your current plan. Track your credits, subscription validity and make changes anytime — all from one place.
album-name-desc: Album Name will be visible to others
greeting-message-desc: Greeting Message (5-8 words) will be shown at the start of the album
user-updation-failed: User updation failed. Please try again.
feature-lifetime-desc: Clients use Pixsabook for a lifetime at low cost
feature-easy-to-use-desc: User-friendly interface to create and manage albums effortlessly
feature-customizable-desc: Personalize albums with themes, layouts, and cover designs
feature-cloud-storage-desc: Securely store and access your albums from anywhere
pixsabook-description: Turn your raw memories into cinematic storybooks. Designed for editors and creators who want full creative control over albums, layouts, and storytelling.
